title: Like A Sword: Erotic Tales of High Fantasy
description: Swords & sorcery stories that swirl with sensuality. These are tales of mages and magic, of warriors and princes and forest folk. But not all battles are won with armies, and magic finds its power not just in heart and soul but in body and desire. Four erotic short stories from some well-known erotica writers and some Jason Rubis, Jean Roberta, Argus Marks, and ADR Forte. [ Explicit erotic material. Some stories contain bondage and dubious consent.]
author: ADR Forte
